setHeaderTextColor(int).Description: Sets the text color of the ad header. Transparency is not supported. @B_android#graphics#Color#rgb_E@ can be used to specify this color.

Parameters: The color of the gradient at the top of the ad.
The color of the gradient at the bottom of the ad.
setBackgroundGradient(int, int).Description: Sets a gradient for the ad background. Calling this method will override any previous calls to @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#Builder#setBackgroundColor_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#Builder#setBackgroundGradient_E@. Transparency is not supported. @B_android#graphics#Color#rgb_E@ can be used to specify these colors.
setBackgroundGradient(int, int).FullName: public SearchAdRequest.Builder setBackgroundGradient (int top, int bottom)

setBorderThickness(int).Description: Sets the thickness of the border in pixels around the ad container. This setting is ignored if @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#Builder#setBorderType_E@ is set to @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#BORDER_TYPE_NONE_E@.

setBackgroundColor(int).Description: Sets the background color of the ad. Calling this method will override any previous calls to @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#Builder#setBackgroundColor_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#Builder#setBackgroundGradient_E@. Transparency is not supported. @B_android#graphics#Color#rgb_E@ can be used to specify this color.

setHeaderTextSize(int).Description: Sets the font size of the header text in pixels. The font sizes for the description and the anchor are determined from the header size.

setBorderType(int).Description: Sets the type of border around the ad container. This value must be one of @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#BORDER_TYPE_NONE_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#BORDER_TYPE_DASHED_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#BORDER_TYPE_DOTTED_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#BORDER_TYPE_SOLID_E@.

setCallButtonColor(int).Description: Sets the color of the call button when a call extension is shown. This value must be one of @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#CALL_BUTTON_COLOR_DARK_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#CALL_BUTTON_COLOR_LIGHT_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#CALL_BUTTON_COLOR_MEDIUM_E@.

setBorderColor(int).Description: Sets the border color of the ad container. Transparency is not supported. @B_android#graphics#Color#rgb_E@ can be used to specify this color. This setting is ignored if @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#Builder#setBorderType_E@ is set to @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#BORDER_TYPE_NONE_E@.

build().Description: Constructs a @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest_E@ with the specified attributes.

Parameters: The @B_java#lang#Class_E@ of the adapter for the network for which you are providing extras.
A @B_android#os#Bundle_E@ of extra information to pass to a mediation adapter.
addNetworkExtrasBundle(java.lang.Class<?.Description: Add extra parameters to pass to a specific ad network adapter.
addNetworkExtrasBundle(java.lang.Class<?.FullName: public SearchAdRequest.Builder addNetworkExtrasBundle (Class<? extends MediationAdapter> adapterClass, Bundle networkExtras)

setFontFace(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the font used to render the ad. The same font is used in the header, the description and the anchor. Fonts are specified using the same value that would be used in CSS (e.g., "arial").

setLocation(android.location.Location).Description: Sets the user's location for targeting purposes.

setDescriptionTextColor(int).Description: Sets the color of the ad description. Transparency is not supported. @B_android#graphics#Color#rgb_E@ can be used to specify this color.

setRequestAgent(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the request agent string to identify the ad request's origin. Third party libraries that reference the Mobile Ads SDK should call this method to denote the platform from which the ad request originated. For example, if a third party ad network called "CoolAds network" mediates requests to the Mobile Ads SDK, it should call this method with "CoolAds".

addNetworkExtras(com.google.android.gms..Description: Add extra parameters to pass to a specific ad network adapter. networkExtras should be an instance of com.google.ads.mediation.NetworkExtras, which is provided by ad network adapters.

setQuery(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the query for requesting a search ad. The query must be set to receive an ad.

Parameters: A list of channel IDs separated by '+'.
setCustomChannels(java.lang.String).Description: Sets custom channels for the ad request. Custom channels allow publishers to track the performance of specific groups of ads. These custom channels need to created on the AdSense website. Reports can then be created based on the channels.

Parameters: Set to true to indicate that your app should be treated as child-directed. Set to false to indicate that your app should not be treated as child-directed.
tagForChildDirectedTreatment(boolean).Description: This method allows you to specify whether you would like your app to be treated as child-directed for purposes of the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) - If you set this method to true, you will indicate that your app should be treated as child-directed for purposes of the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA). If you set this method to false, you will indicate that your app should not be treated as child-directed for purposes of the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA). If you do not set this method, ad requests will include no indication of how you would like your app treated with respect to COPPA. By setting this method, you certify that this notification is accurate and you are authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the app. You understand that abuse of this setting may result in termination of your Google account. Note: it may take some time for this designation to be fully implemented in applicable Google services. This designation will only apply to ad requests for which you have set this method.

Parameters: The @B_java#lang#Class_E@ of the custom event adapter for which you are providing extras.
A @B_android#os#Bundle_E@ of extra information to pass to a custom event adapter.
addCustomEventExtrasBundle(java.lang.Cla.Description: Add extra parameters to pass to a specific custom event adapter.
addCustomEventExtrasBundle(java.lang.Cla.FullName: public SearchAdRequest.Builder addCustomEventExtrasBundle (Class<? extends CustomEvent> adapterClass, Bundle customEventExtras)

setAnchorTextColor(int).Description: Sets the color of the ad URL. Transparency is not supported. @B_android#graphics#Color#rgb_E@ can be used to specify this color.

addTestDevice(java.lang.String).Description: Causes a device to receive test ads. The deviceId can be obtained by viewing the logcat output after creating a new ad. For emulators, use @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#DEVICE_ID_EMULATOR_E@.
